item.title: Highlights from Kevin Kelly's book - 'The Inevitable'
item.description: I recently finished reading Kevin Kelly’s book titled “The Inevitable”. It is truly one of the most influential books I have ever read.

item.title: Unveiling the Essentials of Startup Success
item.description: Sam Altman and Dustin Moskovitz gave a lecture on “How to start a startup” in 2014.
